Marlien

Marlien is a Creation within The Great Beyond which was constructed by the Dead Gods.

Names

Marlien is known by many names: Marlien is from the parable of Solen and Marlien in the Arthalean religion Solenist Academia, where it is the name of the creator, or sleeping godess who dreams creation.

Topography

Marlien is divided into a number of Planes within an outer membrane which bars travel of mortal atman, mana, and time in or out, while allowing anicca to pass in and out, and divine atman to enter in. The nature of this membrane is not understood even by the Charon or their counterparts beyond Marlien.
